title: Hoyer acquires Denmark-based Dantra Group
description:
The Hoyer Group recently acquired Danish family-owned company Dantra Group.

title: Five ways to make the ocean economy more sustainable and just
description: The ocean has long been treated as boundless – a frontier for extraction and a sink for waste. title: Denmark to strengthen Arctic defence amid US interest in Greenland
description:
Denmark has unveiled plans to bolster its military presence in the Arctic amid rising concerns over the US interest in acquiring Greenland, a Danish-owned territory.
